name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Saver Pro - Export & Backup Tabs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save all your open tabs as an HTML file. Perfect for freeing up memory, backing up research, and organizing browsing sessions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Saver Pro is the ultimate solution for managing your browser tabs and preserving your research. With just one click, save all your open tabs across all windows as a beautifully organized, interactive HTML file.

‚Ä¢ Export all tabs from all windows instantly

‚Ä¢ Preserve favicons, titles, and last access times
‚Ä¢ Bulk tab reopening
‚Ä¢ No account required, works offline
‚Ä¢ Zero data collection - everything stays on your device

Perfect for:
üìö Researchers collecting reference materials
üíª Developers managing documentation
üéì Students organizing study resources
üë©‚Äçüíº Professionals handling multiple projects

Use cases:

Smart Features:

Privacy First:
